metadata.Title: CVE-2011-3596 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Polipo before 1.0.4.1 suffers from a DoD vulnerability via specially-crafted HTTP POST / PUT request.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2011-3596` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

polipo - 1.0.4.1-6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: polipo package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.4.1-6').
